item.title: Arch Install | UEFI GRUB NVIDIA SLIM KDE
item.description: Arch Install 221108_1807 Prelude I was running in to some ergo issues with my dev laptop running Manjaro. I wanted a desktop the laptop and dock was being a pain. So I decided to go ahead make a desktop and do an arch install.
